channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Secure Maintenance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Secure Maintenance

item.title: CVE-2024-4753|2024-07-12T06:00:05.863Z -- unknown -- wp%20secure%20maintenance
item.description: The WP Secure Maintenance WordPress plugin before 1.7 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
